USER_TYPE.description: Calls What User Type It Is e.g. USER_TYPE = "ADMIN"

USER_NAME.description: Calls What Name Of the User It Is e.g. USER_NAME = "Martin"

USER_TYPE = \"ADMIN\".description: Calls The User As A Admin

USER_TYPE = \"USER\".description: Calls The User As A Normal User

USER_TYPE = \"GUEST\".description: Calls The User As A Guest

CONTENTS = \"\".description: The Contents Of The user Folder eg. CONTENTS = "root\users\ADMIN_USER\Docs"
